conversation.message: I am highly impressed by the mission and culture of Company C. Your work aligns perfectly with my career aspirations and skills. I am ready to commit fully and contribute immediately to your team.

However, in Round 1, the three candidates ranked above me (Seeker_B, Seeker_A, Seeker_D) are all expected to prioritize Company_E (their Rank 1 company). If they apply to Company_E, Company_C will likely receive only my application (or perhaps Seeker_C's application, but C prefers D first). Therefore, applying immediately to my top choice, Company_C, gives me the best chance of securing a match in Round 1.

We appreciate your patience and hope to remain in contact.
